DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV1 seropositivity . CD4 count > 400/mm3 . Eligibility care military medical system . Prior Medication : Allowed : Acyclovir . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : AIDS ARCdefining condition ( unexplained weight loss , fever , diarrhea , night sweat ) . Evidence AIDS dementia . Chronic hepatitis severe liver dysfunction . Active gastrointestinal , renal , respiratory , endocrine , hematologic , cardiovascular , psychiatric disorder would limit ability complete study . Hemophilia . Coexistent disease likely result death within next 2 year . Known hypersensitivity human interferon alpha . Known anaphylactic hypersensitivity mouse immunoglobulin ( IgG ) , egg protein , neomycin . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Any concurrent experimental medication . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History AIDS ARCdefining condition ( unexplained weight loss , fever , diarrhea , night sweat ) . Evidence chronic hepatitis severe liver dysfunction . Prior Medication : Excluded within 5 day prior study entry : Immunosuppressive agent . Chemotherapy . Steroids . Excluded within 45 day prior study entry : BCG vaccine . Isoprinosine . Other immune modulators . Excluded within 3 month prior study entry : Any form interferon . Antiviral therapy . Immunoregulatory therapy ( acyclovir ) . 1 .
